data.decision: Layer 6 capability system locked with four hard invariants: no hook → deny, wrong turn → deny, unbound token → deny, untrusted output → deny
data.rationale: These invariants form the core of capability security: authority originates from a human event (user message) and is not transferable across turns or to unbound tokens. Each invariant has a regression test that proves the gate slams shut. The system is now secure by invariant + proof, not just secure by vibes.
alternatives: Softer checks with warnings (rejected - security needs hard failures)
Grace periods for migration (rejected - creates windows for exploitation)
Optional binding (rejected - optional security is no security)
